SEARCH
Package de.fherfurt.lat.storage.data.daos

Schnittstelle IGenericDao<T extends AbstractDatabaseEntity>

Typparameter:
T - the type of entity managed by this DAO, which must extend AbstractDatabaseEntity.
Alle bekannten Implementierungsklassen:
JpaGenericDao
public interface IGenericDao<T extends AbstractDatabaseEntity>
Generic Data Access Object (DAO) interface for performing CRUD operations.

This interface provides a set of methods for managing entities that extend AbstractDatabaseEntity. It allows for operations such as finding, creating, updating, and deleting entities.

  • Methodendetails

    • findById

      T findById(int id)
      Finds an entity by its unique identifier.
      Parameter:
      id - the unique identifier of the entity.
      Gibt zurück:
      the entity with the specified id, or null if not found.

    • findAll

      Collection<T> findAll()
      Retrieves all entities of type T.
      Gibt zurück:
      a collection of all entities.

    • create

      boolean create(T entity)
      Creates a new entity in the data store.
      Parameter:
      entity - the entity to be created.
      Gibt zurück:
      true if the entity was created successfully, false otherwise.

    • createAll

      boolean createAll(Collection<T> newEntities)
      Creates multiple new entities in the data store.
      Parameter:
      newEntities - a collection of entities to be created.
      Gibt zurück:
      true if all entities were created successfully, false otherwise.

    • update

      T update(T entity)
      Updates an existing entity in the data store.
      Parameter:
      entity - the entity with updated values.
      Gibt zurück:
      the updated entity.

    • delete

      boolean delete(int id)
      Deletes an entity by its unique identifier.
      Parameter:
      id - the unique identifier of the entity to be deleted.
      Gibt zurück:
      true if the entity was deleted successfully, false otherwise.

    • delete

      boolean delete(T entity)
      Deletes an entity.
      Parameter:
      entity - the entity to be deleted.
      Gibt zurück:
      true if the entity was deleted successfully, false otherwise.

    • delete

      boolean delete(List<T> entries)
      Deletes multiple entities.
      Parameter:
      entries - a list of entities to be deleted.
      Gibt zurück:
      true if all entities were deleted successfully, false otherwise.
